name: corenexus
description: Git Stash Management & Gist Notes for VS Code

mystash.autoRefresh.description: Automatically refresh the stash list when git changes are detected or the window regains focus.

mystash.confirmOnDrop.description: Show a confirmation dialog before dropping a stash.

mystash.confirmOnClear.description: Show a confirmation dialog before clearing all stashes.

mystash.showFileStatus.description: Show M/A/D status indicators on file items in the stash tree.

mystash.defaultIncludeUntracked.description: Default to including untracked files when creating a stash.

enumDescriptions: Show newest stashes first (default git order)
mystash.sortOrder.description: Sort order for the stash list.

mystash.showBranchInDescription.description: Show the branch name in the stash item description.

corenexus.notes.autosaveDelay.description: Autosave delay in seconds for note editing. Set to 0 to disable autosave.

enumDescriptions: New notes are created as secret Gists (default)
New notes are created as public Gists
corenexus.notes.defaultVisibility.description: Default visibility for newly created notes.

corenexus.mattermost.serverUrl.description: Mattermost server URL (e.g. https://mattermost.example.com). Required for Mattermost integration.

corenexus.google.clientId.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID for Google Drive integration. Create one at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

corenexus.google.clientSecret.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client Secret. Required alongside Client ID for Google Drive authentication.

corenexus.ai.includeSecretGists.description: Include secret Gist note content when gathering AI context for summaries, chat, and agent analysis. When disabled, only public notes are shared with the language model.

corenexus.ai.includePrivateMessages.description: Include direct messages and group messages from Mattermost when gathering AI context. When disabled, only public and private channel posts are shared with the language model.

enumDescriptions: Auto — use Copilot when available, fall back to Gemini
Copilot — always use GitHub Copilot (requires Copilot extension)
Gemini — always use Gemini API (requires API key)
corenexus.ai.provider.description: Which AI provider to use. 'auto' prefers Copilot when available and falls back to Gemini.

corenexus.ai.geminiApiKey.description: Google Gemini API key for AI features (summaries, chat, agent). Required when GitHub Copilot is not available (e.g. in Cursor, Windsurf, or Antigravity). Get a free key at https://aistudio.google.com/apikey

enumDescriptions: Gemini 2.0 Flash — previous generation fast model
Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite — fastest, most lightweight
corenexus.ai.geminiModel.description: Default Gemini model to use when the Gemini provider is active.

corenexus.ai.modelOverride.summary.description: Override model for AI summaries. Leave empty to use the provider default.

corenexus.ai.modelOverride.chat.description: Override model for AI chat. Leave empty to use the provider default.

corenexus.ai.modelOverride.agent.description: Override model for AI agent analysis. Leave empty to use the provider default.
